name: The story of Beth
description:
The story of Beth (and how she found the staff of Unreality, traversed treacherous obstacles, and angered the guardian Bull of McGuffin)

Is a platformer, where you do the exact thing(s) the name of the game suggests. Beth is searching for the book McGuffin, which is supposedly somewhere in the jungle of Lost Civilisations. She must take the staff of Unreality into her hand, use it to “unreal” things and use her dexterity and clever mind to navigate through the jungle to find the book. But her story only begins here, as she might have accidentally angered the guardian Bull. Will she safely return home?

Controls

Movement - Left / Right Arrow Keys

Jump - Up Arrow Key

C- Dash

E - Pick up item

Z(/Y) - Use item 1

X - Use item 2

Credits

Barevnej - Lead Programmer & VFX

ItsKita - Programmer, Sound design & Music

john333j - Level design, Code Assistant

Langosh - Artist, UI Design
